description: Numbers with all even digits which can be factored into two numbers with all even digits.
example: 24 = 6*4 is a term but 26= 2*13 is not a term.
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 01 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 05 2001. Further terms from _Matthew Conroy_, Jun 11 2001.
